title: 1910s Pirate Cigarette Pack w/ Slide FS - $75.00
author: canjond

posts.post_title: 1910s Pirate Cigarette Pack w/ Slide FS - $75.00
posts.post_content:
Very clean example of a 1910's era Pirate cigarette pack.  The pack grades EX overall and still retains its inner slide.  Unfortunately, some one long ago removed the T215 :).

$75.00 shipped.

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/Cigarette%20Packs/DSC_0258.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/Cigarette%20Packs/DSC_0259.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/Cigarette%20Packs/DSC_0260.jpg[/IMG]

Jon

I'll take it....email sent.
